Acrobat.description: A master of agility and evasion, the Acrobat excels in acrobatics and sneaking.

Agent.description: A stealthy and cunning operative, the Agent is skilled in security and sneaking.

Assassin.description: A deadly killer, the Assassin is proficient in short blades and sneaking.

Barbarian.description: A fierce warrior, the Barbarian is strong in blunts and heavy armor.

Battlemage.description: A versatile fighter-mage, the Battlemage is skilled in destruction and alteration.

Crusader.description: A holy warrior, the Crusader is proficient in restoration and heavy armor.

Healer.description: A dedicated healer, the Healer excels in restoration and alteration.

Knight.description: A noble warrior, the Knight is skilled in blunts and heavy armor.

Mage.description: A powerful spellcaster, the Mage is proficient in all schools of magic.

Monk.description: A martial artist, the Monk is skilled in hand-to-hand combat and unarmored.

Nightblade.description: A stealthy and deadly rogue, the Nightblade is proficient in short blades and sneaking.

Pilgrim.description: A traveling healer, the Pilgrim is skilled in restoration and alteration.

Rogue.description: A cunning thief, the Rogue is proficient in short blades and security.

Scout.description: A skilled ranger, the Scout is proficient in marksman and athletics.

Sorcerer.description: A master of conjuration, the Sorcerer is skilled in summoning and enchantment.

SpellSword.description: A versatile fighter-mage, the SpellSword is skilled in destruction and alteration.

Thief.description: A stealthy and cunning thief, the Thief is proficient in sneaking and security.

Warrior.description: A formidable fighter, the Warrior is skilled in blunts and heavy armor.

Witchhunter.description: A dedicated hunter of witches, the Witchhunter is skilled in destruction and alteration.
